name: Ninja Fall Jump
description:
Play amazing Endless, Action and Adventure Ninja Fall Jump Game For Kids and Adults!

It's amazing endless game. You need to focus on your character and jump carefully. Create your best score. There are also three different level difficulty like easy, medium and hard.

Top Features:
==========
- Tap to jump.
- 3 levels difficulty.
- Colourful game play.
- Adventure and Action Game play.
- Challenge your friends.

So are you ready for play? Download Now...
